title: Sub  Culture
description:
Title: Sub Culture
Genre: action / 3rd-person / submarine
Released: 11th November 1997
Developer: Criterion Studios
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Description:
You have been cast into the hazardous miniature underwater world of Sub Culture. Using intiative and available resources, you must survive the peril fraught waters that harbour warring factions, scheming pirates and mutant creatures that are all intent on your destruction. Will yours be a watery grave? 

Real-time 3D technology and physics-based modeling create realistic, sophisticated underwater environments. Over 27 engrossing missions with evolving storylines. Nonstop action with over 30 unique weapons including missile launchers, depth charges and strobes. Atmospheric 3D sound with ambient music. Over 20 species of marine life, including stingray, eels and sea horses.

How to play:
1) Run subculture_setup.exe and install the game;
2) Launch the game using its main executable or shortcuts.

! Notice
The game works on modern PCs.
